plot: On a dark nigh in 1906 a messenger finds out hero Capt. Smith in a brothel. The Capt. takes the mono-bike a rides to the airfield where he is given orders. He leads a flight of three planes...
title: Captain Thaddeus J. Smith and the Wolf
